title: AI-Enhanced Attacks Surge by 54%, Warns Acronis Report
description: Cybersecurity threats continue to evolve at an alarming rate, with AI-enhanced phishing attacks emerging as a significant concern for organisations worldwide.  According to the latest cyber threats report from Acronis, a leading cyber protection firm, a staggering 91.1% of organisations across 15 key countries have been impacted by AI-enhanced phishing attacks. This surge in sophisticated […]

title: Ethereum Co-founder Proposes Innovative Defense Against Deepfakes
description: In response to the growing sophistication of AI-generated simulations of real people, Ethereum Co-founder Vitalik Buterin proposes a novel defense mechanism: personalized security questions. Unlike traditional methods such as passwords or generic security questions, these questions rely on unique shared experiences and personal details specific to individuals.Â  By tapping into the richness of human connection, […]

title: AI-Infused XR Underwater Fantasy Mesmerizes at Spring Gala 2024
description: The 2024 Spring Festival Gala, a highly anticipated event broadcast by China Media Group (CMG), captivated audiences with a groundbreaking fusion of advanced technologies, including extended reality (XR), virtual production (VP), and artificial intelligence (AI).  This year’s gala showcased a seamless integration of virtual and real scenes, delivering an unparalleled viewing experience through cutting-edge production […]

title: The great migration of web3 projects from the US to Europe and now Asia | Opinion
description: With the lack of regulatory clarity and willingness to work with the blockchain in the US, migration to the EU and APAC regions will continue to trend.
